title: Eight
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 17 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR50L
description: In Eight, students will become familiar with the high-frequency word eight through a delightful and fun story about a camping trip with friends. Detailed illustrations and repetitive text support early emergent readers. Students will also love looking for the hidden numeral eight on each page! In addition to working on decoding skills, students will have the opportunity to identify main idea and details and connect to prior knowledge.
meta: backpacks, bottles, chairs, eight, friends, hot dogs, lights, raincoats, sticks
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /h/ sound
Periods : Identify and use periods correctly to end sentences
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use high-frequency word eight
